As I am new I'm a bit fuzzy on this "seed" thing, I need some help. Thanks
To seed, don't remove the torrent from your torrent client program after you have finished downloading.
Many of these files are password protected according to my reader -- can you reveal the password?  Not so useful without.

I would suggest you use the included reader.


Not a single issue is password protected.


If you are in any way unsure of this, change the extension to .rar for .cbr and to .zip for .cbz and open up in winrar

What an awesome collection, especially the Epic Illustrated stuff, I grew with all these and collected them for quite some time but they were stolen so that just makes this more awesome. I have been downloading for days at about 15-20KB/s and am at 6.86GB now with 2-3 days left...I hope people keep seeding this! Thanks again for this great torrent!
